definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: We haven't any amplifiers in stock just at present; but they should come in any moment.
sentences.chinese: 目前，擴音機我們正好缺貨，不過隨時可能有貨供應。

sentences.english: A new, unseen voice was booming through the PA system.
sentences.chinese: 一個新的，看不見的聲音從擴音機裏嗡嗡地傳來。
